HC #916 on the move.
HC #916 Scheduled to depart Joliet at 6:25 am is now on the move operating 40 to 45 minutes behind schedule due to a signal issue.

BNSF Inbound Train Delays
Some BNSF inbound trains may be operating up to 35 minutes behind schedule due to earlier mechanical delays. Please visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Track Construction Saturday, January 31 through Sunday, February 1

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, January 31 through Sunday, February 1. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 30 minutes behind scheduled passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDW Inbound and Outbound Train Movement Restored

MDW inbound and outbound train movement has been restored, and some trains may be operating up to 25 minutes behind schedule due to signal problems. Please visit MetraTracker.com for the location of your train.

RID #412 delayed.
RID #412 Scheduled to arrive in Chicago at 9:10 am is currently operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule due to freight train interference.

BNSF #1205 Remains Stopped/Operational Changes

Train #1205 scheduled to arrive Aurora at 7:21 AM is stopped due to mechanical issues on train #1306. Once on the move they will express from Naperville to Aurora, Train #1211 will accommodate passengers. Updates will be provided.

BNSF 1236 Will Not Operate

Train #1236 scheduled to depart Aurora at 7:32 AM, will not operate due to mechanical failure on train #1308. Train #1246 scheduled to depart Aurora at 8:02 AM will accommodate passengers. Visit metratracker.com for train location.

MED 79th, 87th, 103rd St. Station ADA Accessibility
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 79th St., 87th St., and 103rd St. stations may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.

BNSF 1310 On the Move

Train #1310 scheduled to depart Lisle at 7:38 AM, is on the move and operating up to 30 minutes behind schedule due to earlier mechanical failure on train #1308. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
